title: "Waymo Releases Block-NeRF 3D View Synthesis Deep-Learning Model"
excerpt: "Waymo released a ground-breaking deep-learning model called Block-NeRF for large-scale 3D world-view synthesis reconstructed from images collected by its self-driving cars. NeRF has the ability to encode surface and volume representation in neural networks."
